text: John Potter is a race car driver and race team owner. ==Business career== He is also the founder of Magnus Racing. ==Racing career== He is a class winner at the 2012 24 Hours of Daytona, the 2014 12 Hours of Sebring, and the 2016 24 Hours of Daytona. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:24 Hours of Daytona drivers Category:American Le Mans Series drivers Category:Rolex Sports Car Series drivers Category:WeatherTech SportsCar Championship drivers
title: John Potter (racing driver)
